channel.title: Comments on: HostAfrica Acquires DomainKing Nigeria
channel.description: Web × Design; Branditechture is an hybrid creative design agency.

item.title: By: Yusuf Odukoya
item.dc:creator: Yusuf Odukoya
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://branditechture.agency/host-africa-acquires-domainking-nigeria/#comment-250">Nate</a>.
Sure, you can go ahead and host a website with DomainKing. So far, nothing has changed with the way they operate. However, I would recommend that you buy hosting from Namecheap instead. Better support, better server performance and more resource allocation — even their cheapest plan is about 10x better than what you get on DomainKing for about the same fee.
An issue you might encounter with Namecheap is making payments; i.e if your debit card does not support making international payments. If that's the case, you either borrow a friend's card and reimburse him/her, or just go the DomainKing way, which is not that bad for small websites.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nate.

Sure, you can go ahead and host a website with DomainKing. So far, nothing has changed with the way they operate. However, I would recommend that you buy hosting from Namecheap instead. Better support, better server performance and more resource allocation — even their cheapest plan is about 10x better than what you get on DomainKing for about the same fee.

An issue you might encounter with Namecheap is making payments; i.e if your debit card does not support making international payments. If that’s the case, you either borrow a friend’s card and reimburse him/her, or just go the DomainKing way, which is not that bad for small websites.

item.title: By: Nate
item.dc:creator: Nate
item.description:
Just about to host a website with them when I decided to look them up and found this article.
Hope going on with that in a moment like this sounds good?
item.content:encoded:
Just about to host a website with them when I decided to look them up and found this article.
